snippet: A deal with the International Monetary Fund will end a period of uncertainty for donors and the Afghan government about whether small development projects and salary support programs will go forward.
lead_paragraph: A deal with the International Monetary Fund will end a period of uncertainty for donors and the Afghan government about whether small development projects and salary support programs will go forward.

headline.main: Afghan Deal With I.M.F. Will Revive Flow of Aid
headline.print_headline: Afghan Deal With I.M.F. Will Revive Flow of Aid
headline.seo: Afghanistan Deal With I.M.F. Will Renew Credit Program
